27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin 'Amr narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"The merciful are shown mercy by Ar-Rahman. Be merciful on the earth, and you will be shown mercy from Who is above the heavens. The womb is named after Ar-Rahman, so whoever connects it, Allah connects him, and whoever severs it, Allah severs him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي رَحْمَةِ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Being Merciful With People
